title: Combined fry and food scoop with condiment cells

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a combined fry and food scoop with condiment cells, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is an isometric view of a combined fry and food scoop with condiment cells showing my new design;
FIG. 2 is a front view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a rear view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a left side view;
FIG. 5 is a right side view;
FIG. 6 is a top plan view;
FIG. 7 is a bottom plan view;
FIG. 8 is an isometric view of a second embodiment of a combined fry and food scoop with condiment cells showing my new design; and,
FIG. 9 is a top plan view thereof.
All unseen portions of the second embodiment, FIGS. 8 and 9, form no part of the claimed design.
